headline: G.O.P. Blocks to Add Evidence at Start of Trial
abstract: Republicans made last-minute changes to their proposed rules to placate moderates, but they held together to turn back Democratic efforts to subpoena documents.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — A divided Senate began the impeachment trial of President Trump on Tuesday in utter acrimony, as Republicans blocked Democrats’ efforts to subpoena witnesses and documents related to Ukraine and moderate Republicans forced last-minute changes to rules that had been tailored to the president’s wishes.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
